title: Chinese Medicine Guidebook Essential Oils to Balance the Earth Element & Organ Meridians: 5 Element Series
description: In classic Oriental, or Traditional Chinese Medicine, all disease is seen as disordered elements. Restoring balance to the five (5) elements and the harmonious flow of Chi is at the heart of Chinese medicine. Find out essential oils to use and how to use them to balance the 5 elements and to restore the flow of chi through the organ meridians.
